text: Ne endio nolwakhwabakhola enywe Abandu bahakari, khomube abaloli khubandu, ne Omurumwa abe omuloli wenyu, Neshikhwakhola Kibla shienyu shiamwalikhwo halali khokhumanye niwina uloonda Omurumwa, neniwina ukalushila ebisisilo bibie inyuma. Ne kali amatinyu halali khubalia ba Nyasaye yalunjisia, Ne Nyasaye shiyali ukosia obusubili bwenyu tawe, toto Nyasaye khubandu niwetsimbambaasi wabukosia muno
